EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.L.G.G.12127.CDP pay as you go.Non-US Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Pay as your go IoT device management
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your interests in the Nokia Pay as you go IoT device management. This offer is currently available in the United States. The offer will be rolling out to more countries next. We will save your information and notify you once it is available in your country.
Nokia also has on premise and hosted IoT device management <[[http://nokia.ly/2vPeOdL]]> deployment options. Please let us know <[[mailto:pay-as-you-go.cdp@nokia.com]]> if you would like to hear more about them.
Best regards, Nokia IoT device management team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
